text: WWE legend, Joanie ` ` Chyna'' Laurer, has been found dead. Hulk Hogan expresses his devastation over the loss, and refers to her as a ` ` beautiful soul.'' IT ’ S been almost five months since the WWE universe learnt of the shock death of the biggest female star in wrestling history, Chyna. The woman dubbed the “ Ninth Wonder of the World ”, real name Joanie Laurer, was found dead at her home in Redondo Beach, California, believed to be the victim of an accidental overdose of prescription drugs. She was 46. A new feature on the worldwide star by Bleacher Report ’ s Jason King traces her stunning fall from grace back to her decision to walk away from a lucrative WWE contract at the height of her fame.
